memberdef.name: Initialize

briefdescription.para: Sets up a ScrollView window, depending on the constructor variables.

detaileddescription.para: This is the main loop which handles the ScrollView-logic from the server to the client. It basically loops through messages, parses them to events and distributes it to the waiting handlers. It is run from a different thread and synchronizes via SVSync.

briefdescription.para: Sits and waits for events on this window.
